name: A Visual Mix: Ayumi Hamasaki Dome Tour 2001 A
summary: A Visual Mix: Ayumi Hamasaki Dome Tour 2001 A is a concert simulator where you man cameras for a concert for Japanese performer Ayumi Hamasaki.
